name: viscosity-connect
title: Viscosity Connect
description: Easily list, connect, and disconnect your VPN connections configured in Viscosity, all from within Raycast.
author: yigitefe

commands.name: disconnect-all
commands.title: Disconnect All
commands.description: Ends all currently active VPN sessions.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
